content: in next 8 stitches 2 half_double_crochet ch2 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next 8 stitches 3 times slip_stitch to start of round to join fo yarn b 48 half_double_crochet 4 chain spaces round 5 join yarn a to any corner ch2 space using a standing double_crochet or join yarn and ch3 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in the same space you joined to double_crochet in next 12 stitches 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 12 stitches 3 times slip_stitch into start of round to join fo 64 double_crochet 4 chain spaces weave in any ends block if you need to behookedwitch wordpress com 4
